Project 2

Resonado

For this project I helped direct and produce an advertisement for the startup, Resonado.

Our crew took a day trip out to Buffalo Beach, Michigan to capture the footage and stills needed for this project.

Resonado is a tech company focused on small speaker technology.

Thise video was used by Resonado to promote the "Bluepot" a device that functions as a powerbank and speaker.
